alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 2:58AM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
